data.author: Olivier Pasco

changelog.release_notes: 2.10 - added a dark background option plus some other UI tweaks
2.9 - bug fix
2.8 (yes, not 2.08 because CloudPebble won't let me use it) - Health goals can now be set manually
2.07 - just some optimization to reduce the battery usage by redrawing only what needs to be refreshed
2.06 - fixed a stupid bug that was causing some more annoying vibration when reaching a round number of hours of activity and honestly I'm not sure why it did not cause other issues...
2.05 - Fixed a few bugs including more annoying vibrations for people practicing too much sport...
2.04 - apparently vibrations are still annoying (and buggy) so they are now optionnal...
2.03 - quick fix for people using 12h time format and some annoying vibration issue (hopefully less annoying now)
2.02 - Added support for Dual Time, a few vibration warnings and fixed a few bugs

2.01 - Some changes in the UI
- I removed the sliders because, well, I didn't really like them...
- Health info is now showing on the outer ring of the watch. Arrow pointing up is for steps and arrow pointing down is for activity. The arrows move clockwise to indicate progress. Current goals are displayed at the top of the watch
- Rain indication is now a text warning (displayed only if rain is coming). It indicates rain forecast for the next 3 hours.
- The date moved to the middle right of the watch
- New options: you can now enable/disable the date, health indicators, the compass and run-time debug messages
2.0 - now with a compass (experimental) and a settings page! Current options: turn On/Off compass and turn On/Off some run time debug messages. More options should come soon...
1.14 - something unfortunate happened to the hours and minutes hands color. I hope this will make things right again...
1.13 - small tweaks based on early users feadback
1.12 - Some UI tweaks and a better rainfall indicator
1.11 - fixed a few UI bugs, mostly on Pebble Time
1.10 - seems that I'm not using the persistent storage API correctly, which is wired because it looks straight forward enough. Hopefully it is resolved now...
1.9 - changed the activity scales. Now it starts at 2000 steps and 30 minutes of activity and (hopefully) sets itself up to whatever new daily record you set.

1.8 - changed the style of the 3H Rain indicator and made it always visible and added (experimental) support for daily steps goal (currently fixed at 10000/day) and activity (on a fixed base of 8h sleep/day).
1.07 - Added Aplite version (requires firmware 3.8)
1.06 - improved the visibility of the weather icon

data.description:
Analog Pebble Round watch with a simple design but loaded with:
- time (obviously)
- Dual Time (can be used also as a secondary digital time display)
- Battery indicator (the "seconds" hand, rotating counter clockwise as the battery drains)
- weather information (temperature and current weather icon)
- Upcoming rain warning
- Pebble Health steps and activity indicator (outer ring, rotating clockwise, arrow pointing inward shows steps and arrow pointing outward shows activity) with self setting goals (when you pass your goal a new goal is set) or manual goal setting
- Compass

Date, Dual Time, Health and compass can be removed via the option page.

latest_release.release_notes: 2.10 - added a dark background option plus some other UI tweaks

data.title: Round and Smart
